thread.title: UPDATE: Police appeal for witnesses after fatal crash on Hampshire road
thread.title_full: UPDATE: Police appeal for witnesses after fatal crash on Hampshire road

title: UPDATE: Police appeal for witnesses after fatal crash on Hampshire road
text:
Score: 0 beesdee 11:05pm Fri 25 Sep 15 
Just to clarify, when I posted that first comment, all the article said was that there had been a 'collision'! No mention of injury or anything else about it. I obviously wouldn't have said it had the current headline been present. It seems they change the headline but leave existing comments.
